name: 嬰幼兒語文發展
restrict: ◎必須先修過【HGU0004  人類發展】 ◎課程開放上修
description: 本課程目標在增進學生對嬰幼兒語文發展和相關理論的瞭解，並培養學生規劃和執行嬰幼兒語文方案和課程之知能。探討的主題包括嬰幼兒溝通、詞彙和語用能力發展、幼兒讀寫萌發、幼兒語文課程和活動設計、促進嬰幼兒語文能力發展之因素等，課程實施方式包括閱讀教材講述、學生分組報告、語文課室參觀等。
goals: 建立學生嬰幼兒口語和讀寫萌發能力發展歷程及相關理論知識。
培養學生規劃和執行嬰幼兒語文課程和活動方案的能力。
syllabus:
Language development (1): prelinguistic communication   
Language development (2): the tasks of toddlers  
Language development (3): preschool years

Language development (4): individual differences (long distance instruction)

Language development (5) (6): CHILDES & assessment  (long distance instruction)

Mid-term exam (take home exam)

Early literacy (1): introduction  
Early literacy (2): language arts programs

Early literacy (3): children's literature  
Early literacy (4): reading

Early literacy (5): writing

Early literacy (6): family literacy

L2 learning

Guest speaker talk

Project presentations (1) (2)

methodologies.note: face-to-face and on-line long distance instruction (April, 2020)
